languages.text: {n}Махарий бледен, его пальцы дрожат от гнева. Он сухо, со скупым намеком на признательность, кивает вам:{/n} "Обещаю, подобное не повторится".
{n}Macharius is pale, his fingers trembling with anger. He nods dryly, with a hint of grudging gratitude in his voice:{/n} "I promise this will not happen again."
languages.original_text: {n}Махарий бледен, его пальцы дрожат от гнева. Он сухо, со скупым намеком на признательность, кивает вам:{/n} "Обещаю, подобное не повторится".

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius is pale, his fingers trembling with anger. He nods dryly, with a stingy hint of gratitude in his voice:{/n} "I promise this won't happen again."
{n}Macharius is pale, his fingers trembling with anger. He nods dryly, with a stingy hint of gratitude in his voice:{/n} "I promise this won't happen again."
{n}Macharius is pale, his fingers trembling with anger. He nods dryly, with a stingy hint of gratitude in his voice:{/n} "I promise this won't happen again."
{n}Macharius is pale, his fingers trembling with anger. He nods dryly, with a hint of grudging gratitude in his voice:{/n} "I promise this will not happen again."
{n}Macharius is pale, his fingers trembling with anger. He nods dryly, with a hint of grudging gratitude in his voice:{/n} "I promise this will not happen again."

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Macharius pâlit et vous voyez ses mains trembler de colère. Il hoche sèchement la tête et vous répond, une pointe de gratitude dans la voix :{/n} « Je vous promets que ça ne se reproduira plus. »
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius is pale, his fingers trembling with anger. He nods dryly, with a hint of grudging gratitude in his voice:{/n} "I promise this will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Macharius pâlit et vous voyez ses mains trembler de colère. Il hoche sèchement la tête et vous répond, une pointe de gratitude dans la voix :{/n} « Je vous promets que ça ne se reproduira plus. »

languages.text: {n}马卡里乌斯脸色苍白，手指因愤怒而颤抖。他干巴巴地点点头，带着一丁点不情不愿的感激之情。{/n}“我保证，这种事情不会再发生了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius is pale, his fingers trembling with anger. He nods dryly, with a hint of grudging gratitude in his voice:{/n} "I promise this will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}马卡里乌斯脸色苍白，手指因愤怒而颤抖。他干巴巴地点点头，带着一丁点感激之情。{/n}“我保证，这种事情不会再发生了。”

languages.text: {n}Macharius ist blass, seine Finger zittern vor Zorn. Er nickt kurz und sagt mit einem Hauch von widerwilliger Dankbarkeit in der Stimme:{/n} "Ich verspreche, es wird nicht wieder vorkommen."
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius is pale, his fingers trembling with anger. He nods dryly, with a hint of grudging gratitude in his voice:{/n} "I promise this will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius ist blass, seine Finger zittern vor Zorn. Er nickt trocken und sagt mit einem geizigen Hauch Dankbarkeit in der Stimme:{/n} "Ich verspreche, es wird nicht wieder vorkommen."

languages.text: {n}Macharius se queda pálido y sus dedos tiemblan de ira. Asiente inexpresivamente, pronunciando con un ligero atisbo de gratitud:{/n} «Le prometo que esto no volverá a ocurrir».
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius is pale, his fingers trembling with anger. He nods dryly, with a hint of grudging gratitude in his voice:{/n} "I promise this will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius se queda pálido y sus dedos tiemblan de ira. Asiente inexpresivamente, pronunciando con un ligero atisbo de gratitud:{/n} «Le prometo que esto no volverá a ocurrir».

languages.text: {n}マハリウスは顔を青くして、指を怒りで震わせる。コクコクとうなずき、ほんのり乾いた声でうなずいた。{/n}「二度とこんなことはないと約束します」
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius is pale, his fingers trembling with anger. He nods dryly, with a hint of grudging gratitude in his voice:{/n} "I promise this will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}マハリウスは顔を青くして、指を怒りで震わせる。コクコクとうなずき、ほんのり乾いた声でうなずいた。{/n}「二度とこんなことはないと約束します」

languages.text: {n}Macharius'un beti benzi atıyor, öfkeden parmakları titriyor. Ruhsuzca başını sallıyor. Sesinden, isteksiz de olsa biraz minnet duyduğu belli oluyor.{/n} "Size söz veriyorum, bir daha böyle bir şey yaşanmayacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Macharius is pale, his fingers trembling with anger. He nods dryly, with a hint of grudging gratitude in his voice:{/n} "I promise this will not happen again."

traits.locale_text: {n}Macharius'un beti benzi atmış, öfkeden parmakları titriyordu. Ruhsuzca başını salladı. Sesinden, isteksiz de olsa biraz minnet duyduğu belli oluyordu.{/n} "Söz veriyorum, bir daha böyle bir şey yaşanmayacak."
